EmailTemplate.subject: Happy Holidays
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, <[[https://turbonomic.com/happy-holidays/]]> No tech talk today, simply wishing you and your loved ones a happy and safe holiday season on behalf of the Turbonomic family. Enjoy the time to relax and cherish what is truly important. Hereâ€™s to a bright New Year! - The Turbonomic Team
